ratings.comment: SPAN3840- really can't recommend Rachel enough!!! Very compassionate and understanding. The work is reasonable and manageable to be completed mostly with ease.
Good teacher, recommend taking it with her.

Incredibly nice, helpful, and approachable. Makes class enjoyable and knows how to teach the material. Course is difficult: 6 test (lowest dropped), 3 papers. Fairly tough grader but very fair and always willing to help. Enjoys teaching and really cares about students.
Made class interesting and fun. Definitely proofread your essays before turning them in, but overall, it's not a very difficult class.

Rachel is incredibly nice. She will do all she can to ensure you get a good grade. Very approachable. Gives relatively challenging tests, but manageable if you study. Not too hard of a grader on papers. Always smiling and makes class fly by.

Rachel was an excellent TA. The new Spanish 226 is intense, but she does an excellent job of keeping it interesting and if you go to class and participate actively, she will have you prepared for the tests. My favorite teacher at UW so far.

Rachel is really nice and helpful and works really hard to make the class fun. The exams are hard, so make sure to study really well for those and definitely proofread your essays before you turn them in.

A bit of a diva. V. clear and a good teacher, but definitely into herself and select students. Review your essays well before turning them in, it will save your grade later. Actually read the text, since she just briefly reviews it and moves on. Participate and speak your best Spanish. Not hard to get an AB, but hard to get an A.

This class was a more intense review of Spanish 5 in high school.  Rachel was a very clear teacher, and if you review the syllabus you will know exactly what will be on the tests.  Participate a couple times a day, know the vocab and problematic expressions, be thorough on your compositions, know the grammar rules, and you will get an A or AB.
A very good teacher, one of my all time favorites
she was extremely fun and did whatever she could to help.
I really hated the class, but i have to say she was really good and made it the best possible. If u enjoy spanish i would recommend the class.

By far the best teacher I've ever had. Extremely helpful with grammar and other notes, the nicest person. Made class fun, especially at 8:50 - lots of games, movies, songs, etc. Not a hard class by any means. She's so hot, too! I was so disapointed when I found out she was taken :(
